Hellâ€™s Kitchen...is a propulsive, high-energy dose of music and dance that will have you bopping your head, waving your arms, and tapping your knees. The sugar rush of its two-dozen musical numbers, three new ones joined to those chosen from the Keys songbook, however, comes with meager nutrients for the brain; the net result is audibly and visually entertaining but not otherwise fulfilling.
